game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to the village elder.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the lost artifact is hidden deep in the jungle. It's said to hold great power and bring prosperity to the village.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and the villagers' gratitude

task.objective: Enter the jungle and locate the ancient ruins.
task.description: A local villager has marked the entrance to the jungle on your map. Find the ruins where the artifact is believed to be hidden.
The ruins are filled with traps and puzzles. Solve them to reach the heart of the ruins where the artifact is said to be kept.
